    • Method Detail

      • serializeConditionally

        public static void serializeConditionally(java.io.Serializable objectToSerialize,
                          java.lang.String pathToFile,
                          java.util.UUID builderId)
        Serializes the passed Object to the specified file, given that the last serialization did take place before (current time - serializationTimeInterval).
        Parameters:
        objectToSerialize - The object (i.e. TreeBuilder) to serialize.
        pathToFile - The location where the serialized file is written.
        builderId - The id of the TreeBuilder. Is appended to the filename.

      • serialize

        public static void serialize(java.io.Serializable objectToSerialize,
             java.lang.String pathToFile,
             java.util.UUID objectUuid)
        Serializes the passed Object to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        objectToSerialize - object (i.e. TreeBuilder) to serialize.
        pathToFile - The location where the serialized file is written.
        objectUuid - The id of the object. Is appended to the filename.

      • deserialize

        public static java.lang.Object deserialize(java.lang.String pathToFile)
        De-serializes an object from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - the file from which the TreeBuilder is de-serialized.
        Returns:
        a de-serialized object or null if path is not readable or de-serialization failed.

      • createOutputFilePath

        private static java.lang.String createOutputFilePath(java.lang.Object objectToSerialize,
                                    java.lang.String pathToFile,
                                    java.util.UUID objectId)
        Creates the path to the output file according to the following schema:
        <pathToFile-parent-directory>/<pathToFile-last-component-minus-possible-".ser">_<simple-class-name-of-objectToSerialize>_<objectId.toString()>.ser
        Parameters:
        objectToSerialize - the object that is serialized
        pathToFile - the output path as specified by the users input argument
        objectId - the uuid of the object to serialize
        Returns:
        the path to the output file
